p: Extracts of C. Nucifera L , P. guajava, and C. citratus, which were reported as useful for the management of malaria [ 10, 18, 35, 36], did not demonstrate any appreciable antiplasmodial activity in this study. These studies were performed in vitro and it is possible that the constituents in the plants might require bioactivation in vivo to exhibit antiplasmodial activity [ 12].
